abstract: Third-quarter profit rose to $1.67 billion from $1.27 billion a year earlier as Verizon Wireless added 2.1 million subscribers in the quarter.
snippet: Third-quarter profit rose to $1.67 billion from $1.27 billion a year earlier as Verizon Wireless added 2.1 million subscribers in the quarter.
lead_paragraph: Verizon Communications’ stock price jumped 10.1 percent Monday on news that profit increased 31 percent for the third quarter, buoyed by surprising gains in the number of new wireless customers.

headline.main: Profit Up at Verizon on Strong Wireless Sales
headline.print_headline: Verizon Shares Jump On Report Of Big Profit
